'''Chise''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the World Quest series ''[[Through the Mists]]''. He also appears as a spirit after the quest series is done, southwest of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Autake Plains]].

==Location==
After the completion of the "Through the Mists" series, Chise can be found as a ghostly figure southwest of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Autake Plains]].
